trigger: The amount of renewable generation in the grid changes
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the amount of renewable generation in the grid changes.
This trigger fires when the price of electricity goes below a user-defined price threshold.

trigger: Grid is being powered by lots of fossil fuels
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the amount of renewable generation in the grid goes below a user-defined percentage threshold.

trigger: Grid is being powered by lots of renewables
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the amount of renewable generation in the grid goes above a user-defined percentage threshold.
This trigger fires when the price of electricity changes.
This trigger fires when the price of electricity goes above a user-defined price threshold.
